Title: Relates to the personal income tax rates; repealer
Summary: Phases in tax cuts to the personal income tax over a period of ten years; repeals certain provisions relating to tax benefit recapture.
LawCode: Rpld §601 sub§ (a), sub 1 sub§ (b), sub§§ (c), (d), (d-5), (d-6) & (d-7), sub§ (d-4) opening ¶, amd §601, Tax L
